posts.postText: Ive been having this problem for months now in Jailbreak,its hard to rebel,protect myself from rebelers and even drop my damn gun...Video here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZNzOKucZE-k

Oh god, I used to have this problem too. It was fixed after I deleted many of my unneeded mods.

Not sure if it was the mods or not.
Thank you for replying i thought no one would ill just try that
Alright. Let me know how it goes. :)
